content:
Here are the 10 contextual nudges personalized for different types of members of Anytime Fitness and their preferences:

| Nudge # | Young Adults/Students | Professionals | Retirees | Quieter Environment Seekers | Group Workout Enthusiasts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Introduce affordable student membership plans and study-break workout suggestions in the welcome tour. | Highlight time-efficient workouts and extended hours in the welcome tour. | Showcase low-impact exercises and age-appropriate activities in the welcome tour. | Emphasize quieter hours and ample equipment during the welcome tour. | Feature popular group classes, such as Zumba, Bootcamp, and HIIT, in the welcome tour. |
| 2 | Send notifications about student discounts, study-break workouts, and events tailored to young adults. | Notify professionals of time-efficient workouts, peak hours, and work break exercise suggestions. | Inform retirees about low-impact exercises, senior-focused events, and age-appropriate activities. | Update quieter environment seekers about less busy hours and equipment availability. | Alert group workout enthusiasts about upcoming classes, schedules, and special events. |
| 3 | Display in-app banners promoting events for young adults, such as themed workout nights or social gatherings. | Feature banners for professionals, highlighting lunchtime classes and efficient workout routines. | Showcase banners for retirees with age-specific activities and low-impact exercise classes. | Present banners emphasizing equipment availability and quieter hours. | Advertise popular group classes and related community events in banners. |
| 4 | Offer workout routine suggestions tailored to young adults, including stress-relief exercises and campus fitness events. | Recommend time-efficient workouts and routines that fit professionals' busy schedules. | Suggest age-appropriate workouts and activities designed for retirees. | Provide suggestions for less crowded hours and equipment-focused workouts. | Propose group classes and social workout activities tailored to users' preferences. |
| 5 | Send reminders about student-focused events, group classes, or social gatherings they signed up for. | Remind professionals about upcoming lunchtime classes, after-work events, or personal appointments. | Notify retirees of upcoming age-appropriate events, classes, or social gatherings. | Update quieter environment seekers about less crowded hours and any upcoming equipment maintenance. | Alert group workout enthusiasts about upcoming class schedules and any changes. |
| 6 | Encourage young adults to share their workout achievements, events attended, and social connections on social media. | Motivate professionals to share their time-efficient workouts and fitness milestones. | Inspire retirees to share their age-appropriate workouts and social activities. | Prompt quieter environment seekers to share their workout routines and equipment-focused achievements. | Urge group workout enthusiasts to share their class experiences, achievements, and social connections. |
| 7 | Display event countdowns for student-focused events or group classes popular among young adults. | Showcase countdowns for lunchtime classes, after-work events, or goal-oriented challenges. | Highlight countdowns for age-specific events or group classes designed for retirees. | Emphasize countdowns for equipment maintenance or less crowded hours. | Present countdowns for group classes, special events, or community challenges. |
| 8 | Reward young adults with achievement badges for attending student-focused events or completing campus fitness challenges. | Give professionals badges for completing time-efficient workouts or attending lunchtime classes. | Award retirees with badges for participating in age-appropriate activities or low-impact exercises. | Grant badges to quieter environment seekers for achieving equipment-focused milestones. | Present group workout enthusiasts with badges for attending classes and engaging in social activities. |
| 9 | Use tooltips to provide helpful hints for young adults, such as study-break |  |  |  |  |
